Opera Overview

The obect of this series is to make a series of musical insturments, set pieces, and special effects machines. Once these things are made we will perform an opera.

Intended Path

At the moment, there are no talented artists or musicians participating in our project. Our current goal is to simply make the stage. Hopefully talented people will step forward and join the fun. Otherwise this may be a very embarrasing opera. The current items in development is are a Keytaur that shoots lightning bolts, and electric digereedoo that shoots fireballs, the telharmonium mark II, the moving parts amplifiers, and lighting effects systems. We'd like to have a floating stage, but no one can fugure out how to do this.

The plot of the opera is vaugue and there are no lyrics yet. There has been some discussion about adapting the final fantasy 6 opera scene and staging it in space. Here
